response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $25,000 to us, reflecting its quality, uniqueness, and potential benefits. We are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $22,000, hoping to make this opportunity more accessible while still ensuring a fair return on our investment. We believe this is a fantastic deal, considering the value and benefits the product offers. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 22000}
